review: This thing rocks!  Every home should have one.
author: Amy Garrett

review: My son loves this, too.  Got it with his Chrome book.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Not great for streaming video and picture isn't amazing.
author: Lance

review: I was disappointed to fine out that it does not allow me to replicate what's on my laptop to my HDTV. I can browse the internet with the Chrome browser, but I still can't use Word on my TV while sitting on the couch. The original ads led me to believe this -wishful thinking on my behalf.
author: JEFFREY J FRICK

review: Chromecast1056 will not take setup instructions.
author: Danny E. Sieg
